attributes.action: Allow Scotland to hold another Independence referendum
attributes.additional_details: Scotland is able to survive on its own, and the people of Scotland should be able to make their own mind up about if we should be. I don't think the way things have went the last 10 years would have been as bad if we voted for independence the first time. The Scots shouldn't have to go through it because the UK parliament decides everything.
attributes.background: Allow the Scottish people to have another independence referendum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701455
